name: Gamble With Death
description:
Made for the GMTK  game jam 2022

You play as a small poker chip and have to fend for your life as bullets are summoned through rolling dice.  You can roll dice of your own to increase your own score at the cost of spawning even more bullets into the arena.

Music Used: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L_OYo2RS8iU
Sound effects generator with: https://sfxr.me/

Controls:

A and D to move left and right
SPACE to jump
R to roll the dice (10-second cooldown)
